maxquestion1: Are you sure you want to be enable the Max Bet button?
maxquestion2: Are you sure you want to be disable the Max Bet button?
info1: 1.The allocation model will determine different potential payouts through risk and multipliers.
info2: 2.Do not turn your device or display to defy gravity while the game is in progress.
hotkeyInfo: When the hotkeys are enabled, they will remain on for all games until disabled. Despite some games sharing similar key binds, it's always advised to confirm what key interactions are set for each game.
